sentences.en: A dense column of smoke rose several miles into the air.
sentences.cn: 一股浓烟升到了几英里的高空。
居住在乡村的密集人口
浓雾 / 烟；浓烈的气体

sentences.en: Dense smoke swirled and billowed, its rank fumes choking her.
sentences.cn: 滚滚浓烟盘旋翻腾，恶臭味呛得她喘不过气来。

sentences.en: He had a dense, ponderous style.
He's not a bad man, just a bit dense.
sentences.cn: 他人不坏，就是有点儿愚钝。

sentences.en: His prose is vigorous and dense, occasionally to the point of obscurity.
sentences.cn: 他的散文文笔有力、内容庞杂，有时几近晦涩。

sentences.en: Its fur is short, dense and silky.
sentences.cn: 它的毛又短又密，柔软光洁。

sentences.en: Lobell drove on and on through the dense and blowing snow.
sentences.cn: 洛贝尔冒着纷飞的大雪不停地往前开。

sentences.en: Parts of the forest are still dense and inaccessible.
sentences.cn: 森林的一些部分仍然很茂密，人迹罕至。

sentences.en: The area was covered in dense jungle.
There was dense smoke pouring from all four engines.
They walked through the dense Mozambican bush for thirty six hours.
sentences.cn: 他们花了36个小时穿过茂密的莫桑比克丛林。

sentences.en: This creature's fur is short, dense and silky.
sentences.cn: 这种动物的毛又短又密、丝般柔滑。

sentences.en: Twenty million years ago, Idaho was populated by dense primordial forest.
sentences.cn: 2,000万年前，爱达荷州到处都是茂密的原始森林。

sentences.en: Where Bucharest now stands, there once was a large, dense forest.
sentences.cn: 布加勒斯特的所在地过去曾是一大片茂密的森林。

trans.tran_cn: 密集的，浓的，密度大的，费解的，愚钝的
trans.tran_en: made of or containing a lot of things or people that are very close together
